Key Match Events: Chapman and Dean Foxcroft then put on 117 for the third wicket
Chapman and James Neesham then got the tourists home with Chapman's 87 coming off 42 balls and included nine fours and four sixes
Pre-Game Insights: Debutants bowled some tough overs and Ish was outstanding
Yesterday it was slower and we lost wickets in clumps... you have 100 partnership, you give yourself a good chance to win
The way Siefert and Robinson set it up, we had a platform and we just tried to keep up with the rate, we knew they have world class attack
Post-Match Reflections: I think we know Pakistan have a great attack, 178 was a chase-able score, generally it's high scoring here
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Black Caps have levelled the T20 series with Pakistan after winning the third game in Rawalpindi by seven wickets
Tim Robinson and Tim Seifert put on 42 for the opening partnership
Shadab Khan top-scored with 41, while Ish Sodhi took 2/25
